root: ^Zzzttt zt zt t-t-testing testing. Can you hear me?
^Ah, good. Hello friends. I'm glad you are awake.
^Friends? Who the hell are you? Let us out of here.
^As you can see, you two are confined to this room. But not for long.
^Hey! Are you listening to me? Who are you, and what do you want with us?
^Yes, I can hear you. This is not a prerecorded video. I'm choosing to ignore you.
^Be quiet and listen like the smart young lady by your side.
^As I was saying, you will soon be let out of this room... into an even bigger room! Where you will still be trapped, and forced to play my game.
^Playing my game is the only way out, you see.
^What if we don't want to play your game?
^Then you will be stuck here. With no food or water or bathrooms.
^Got it??? How are you so calm about this?
^Hey monitor man, what kinda game are you talking about? Are you going to make us play sports or something?
^Please say no, I'm not very good at sports.
^No my friend, you will not be forced to play sports.
^You will be forced to play a social deduction game!
^Once the game is set up, you two will be released into the game room. There, you will meet four other participants, who you will play this game with.
^Each participant will have a role. They, and you, will be secretly assigned an "Angel" or "Demon" role.
^There will be two Demons, and four Angels. A total of six participants.
^In addition to your role, you will also be assigned a number which determines the order in which you vote.
^Yes, this is a voting game! Each round, in the order they were assigned, participants will publicly vote for one other person.
^So what happens to the person with the majority votes? They die? Are we trying to find the demons and eliminate them?
^Silly girl, this is not a game that has to do with majority vote.
^It does not matter who gets the most votes. Rather, it matter whether an angel or a demon voted.
^When a demon votes for somebody, that vote will eliminate the recipient of the vote. However, if an angel also voted for that person, the angel's vote will save them.
^Basically, a demon's vote will kill, and an angel's vote will save.
^I DON'T see. What do you mean by kill? This isn't some fantasy land, this is the real world.
^People die in the real world, Blake.
^Well, like, yeah, obviously, but... but... you mean kill within the game right? You dont actually mean the person will die... right?
^Oh the person will absolutely die. In the real world.
^You have bomb collars attached to your necks.
^Look man, you have the wrong guy. You clearly meant to kidnap someone else-
^You were chosen for a reason, Blake Bennet.
